entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.3°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %

Dewpoint: -10.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening and ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 17 in low lying areas.
